title: Pepsi is apparently making a smartphone
text:
Pepsi is apparently making a smartphone 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
In what seems to be an extremely uncharacteristic move, Pepsi is rumoured to be making an Android smartphone, with a 5.5-inch screen and a $...
